news.title: How Trump's tariffs rollout turned into stock market mayhem
news.summary: "What's happened is something worse than the worst-case scenario," he says. "It's not the end of the world. It's the beginning of a new era"

news.title: China says 'market has spoken' after Trump tariffs spark global stocks rout
news.summary: China's Foreign Ministry says "the market has spoken" following the U.S. imposition of sweeping new tariffs. China says it will respond by imposing its own tariffs on the United States.

news.title: Silicon Valley's early return on Trump investment: Plunging valuations, delayed IPOs
news.summary: The Nasdaq closed its worst week since the Covid pandemic. Several tech companies delaying IPOs. Silicon Valley's Trump bet is looking shaky.

news.title: Automakers seek ‘opportunity in the chaos’ of Trump’s tariffs
news.summary: Ford and Stellantis are offering employee-pricing programs. Hyundai said it would not raise prices for at least two months to ease consumer concerns.

news.title: Congress has power over tariffs, but stopping Trump isn't likely as of now
news.summary: President Trump has imposed higher tariffs on more than 180 countries. Stock market indices have sharply fallen on the heels of President Trump imposing higher tariffs.
